title: Brazil : poverty headcount ratio at 3.20 U.S. dollars a day 2005 to 2017
summary: Overall Percentage of population has decreased over the Year.
Percentage of population is slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Percentage of population, of value 8.7 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Percentage of population about 8.2 was reached at Year 2013
